metadata.title: CVE-2024-57639 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the dc_elt_size component of openlink virtuoso-opensourcev7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
